text.__SUMMARY__: Rhododendron subansiriense is a species of plant in the family Ericaceae. It is endemic to Arunachal Pradesh in India.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Rhododendron subansiriense". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31243A9618851. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31243A9618851.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
